sections.heading: Overview
content:
Todd Zwillich is a freelance reporter in Washington, D.C. He has
covered science and health care politics and policy since 1996 for
publications including Reuters, Science magazine, and WebMD. Zwillich
has written extensively on a broad range of policy topics including health
insurance, Medicare, and bioterrorism. He has also covered controversial topics
including human cloning, vaccine risks, and abortion.
© 2005 - 2026 WebMD LLC, an Internet Brands company. All rights reserved. WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. See additional information.
